Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Snowflipper Penguin
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Acherus Veteran
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Animated Berserker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Breath of Sindragosa
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deadscale Knight
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doomerang
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Leeching Poison
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Play Dead
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's a very literal dog.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Righteous Protector
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sanguine Reveler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Wretched Tiller
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to_the enemy hero.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bring It On!
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Brrrloc
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Cryostasis
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Dark Conviction
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Dead Man's Hand
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Defile
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Desperate Stand
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drain Soul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to a minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Druid of the Swarm
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fallen Sun Cleric
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Forge of Souls
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Gnomeferatu
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Remove the top card of your opponent's deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She prefers the term "Glampire."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Fishing
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Walker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Keleseth
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 2-Cost cards, give_all minions in your deck +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Roll the Bones
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw a card. If it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadow Ascendant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give another random
friendly minion +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spirit Lash
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal Deal $1 damage to_all_minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tainted Zealot
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Divine Shield Spell Damage +1
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Toxic Arrow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tuskarr Fisherman
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Venomstrike Trap
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3_Poisonous Cobra.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Acolyte of Agony
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bearshark
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Candygram."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Coldwraith
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Crypt Lord
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt After you summon a minion, gain +1 Health.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The original fifth beetle!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathspeaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doomed Apprentice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Defender
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Overload: (3)
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Enchanter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frozen Clone
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Gnash
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Happy Ghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: When life gives you snow…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howlfiend
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howling Commander
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Breaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mindbreaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Hero Powers are disabled.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mountainfire Armor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, gain 6 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Plague Scientist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Taldaram
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowblade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shallow Gravedigger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Simulacrum
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Stitched Tracker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Treachery
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]After this minion
survives damage,
summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Vryghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arfus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random Lich King card to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arrogant Crusader
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Avalanche
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood Razor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all_minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Chillblade Champion
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Charge Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpsetaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathaxe Punisher
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Eternal Servitude
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Exploding Bloatbat
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ghastly Conjurer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grave Shambler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grim Necromancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Keening Banshee
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Light's Sorrow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Lilian Voss
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Meat Wagon
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Night Howler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
Whenever this minion takes
damage, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Phantom Freebooter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Valanar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Professor Putricide
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After you play a Secret, put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rattling Rascal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Runeforge Haunter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Saronite Chain Gang
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Strongshell Scavenger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ticking Abomination
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Wicked Skeleton
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bloodworm
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's so hot right now.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Baron
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Cobalt Scalebane
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Raiser
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Widow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Death Revenant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Despicable Dreadlord
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's deathspicable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Devour Mind
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fatespinner
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skelemancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spectral Pillager
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Combo: Deal 2 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Thrall, Deathseer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tomb Lurker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Venomancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Poisonous
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Voodoo Hexxer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Webweave
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blackguard
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Drake
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Embrace Darkness
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
At the start of your turn,
gain control of it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Furnacefire Colossus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Moorabi
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Necrotic Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Nerubian Unraveler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spells cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadow Essence
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skulking Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spellweaver
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spell Damage +2
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spreading Plague
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Abominable Bowman
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Archbishop Benedictus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bonemare
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Glacial Mysteries
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rotface
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sindragosa
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: The Lich King
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Lich King card to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frost Lich Jaina
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hadronox
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that died this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Obsidian Statue
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Valeera the Hollow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ultimate Infestation
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage. Draw
5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.
Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Snowfury Giant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!
